process.name: TCP4-2242 Process Files Attach
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_1" name="SendEmail1" pm:config="{"emailServer":1,"type":"text","subject":"Subject 1 {{_request.id}}","textBody":"<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n<head>\n  <title>HTML Elements Reference</title>\n</head>\n<body>\n\n<h1>This is a heading</h1>\n<p>This is a paragraph.</p>\n\n</body>\n</html>","screenRef":null,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":["pablo.barroso@processmaker.com"],"requestRecipients":[],"attachments":[{"source":"variable","variableInArray":"","value":"archivos"},{"source":"variable","variableInArray":"","value":"archivos2"},{"source":"variable","variableInArray":"","value":"loop_1.0.archivos3"},{"source":"url","variableInArray":"","value":"https://www.amazon.es/islam-Historia-Presente-Estructuras-Procesos/dp/8481649201/ref=sr_1_12?__mk_es_ES=%C3%85M%C3%85%C5%BD%C3%95%C3%91&crid=1W8LEKS9AUQ4&keywords=el+islam&qid=1662465043&sprefix=el+i%2Caps%2C639&sr=8-12"}],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:ioSpecification id="node_1_inner_1634150192604">
        <bpmn:dataInput id="node_1_input_1" name="loop_1" isCollection="true"/>
        <bpmn:dataOutput id="node_1_output_1" name="output_array" isCollection="true"/>
        <bpmn:inputSet id="node_1_inner_1634150192607">
          <bpmn:dataInputRefs>node_1_input_1</bpmn:dataInputRefs>
        </bpmn:inputSet>
        <bpmn:outputSet id="node_1_inner_1634150192608">
          <bpmn:dataOutputRefs>node_1_output_1</bpmn:dataOutputRefs>
        </bpmn:outputSet>
      </bpmn:ioSpecification>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_2" name="StartEvent" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="192" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_4" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_11" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="192" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_13" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_11"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_11" targetRef="node_1"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="330" y="220" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="100" y="240" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="480" y="220" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="640" y="240" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="388" y="258"/>
        <di:waypoint x="538" y="258"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="538" y="258"/>
        <di:waypoint x="658" y="258"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <dc:Bounds x="180" y="220" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <di:waypoint x="118" y="258"/>
        <di:waypoint x="238" y="258"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="238" y="258"/>
        <di:waypoint x="388" y="258"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
